特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

トピック.授業計画1: We will cover a variety of topics in class, including conflict resolution, current events, technology, prejudice, and cross cultural communication. We will use videos, audio, stories and other authentic materials to keep the class interesting and challenging. There will be daily interaction with your classmates and teachers, and sometimes foreign students and visitors. There will also be a mid-term and final presentations.
トピック.授業外学習2: 予習・復習をすること。

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【100】英語コミュニケーションII　１／English Communication II
担当者: エリオット　リディア（ELLIOTT LIDIJA）
